title: ECharts xAxis component
description: xAxis component config. Use as top-level key in ECharts option.

axisLabel.description: Props: show, inside, rotate, showMinLabel, showMaxLabel, alignMinLabel, alignMaxLabel, verticalAlignMinLabel, verticalAlignMaxLabel, margin, rich, hideOverlap, customValues, color, overflow, align, verticalAlign, width, height, fontSize, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

nameTextStyle.description: Props: rich, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, fontSize, align, verticalAlign, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, width, height, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

axisPointer.description: Props: show, z, zlevel, triggerOn, type, snap, triggerTooltip, triggerEmphasis, value, status, label, animation, animationDurationUpdate, animationEasingUpdate, lineStyle, shadowStyle, handle, seriesDataIndices

axisLine.description: Props: show, onZero, onZeroAxisIndex, symbol, symbolSize, symbolOffset, lineStyle

axisTick.description: Props: show, inside, length, lineStyle, customValues

splitLine.description: Props: show, interval, showMinLine, showMaxLine, lineStyle

min.description:
Min value of the axis. can be:
+ ScaleDataValue
+ 'dataMin': use the min value in data.
+ null/undefined: auto decide min value (consider pretty look and boundaryGap).

max.description:
Max value of the axis. can be:
+ ScaleDataValue
+ 'dataMax': use the max value in data.
+ null/undefined: auto decide max value (consider pretty look and boundaryGap).

animationThreshold.description: Disable animation when the number of elements exceeds the threshold

animationDuration.description:
Duration of initialize animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDelay.description:
Delay of initialize animation
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDurationUpdate.description:
Delay of data update animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDelayUpdate.description:
Delay of data update animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element
